title: Everything you need to know
subtitle: Have questions about our design subscription service? We've got answers.

items.question: How does the design subscription work?
items.answer: Once subscribed, you can submit unlimited design requests through our platform. We'll work on them one at a time and deliver high-quality designs within the specified timeframe.

items.question: What's included in unlimited revisions?
items.answer: We'll continue refining your design until you're 100% satisfied. There's no limit to the number of revision rounds, ensuring you get exactly what you envision.

items.question: Can I pause or cancel my subscription?
items.answer: Yes, you can pause your subscription at any time and resume when needed. You can also cancel with no long-term commitments or cancellation fees.

items.question: What types of design work do you handle?
items.answer: We cover all design needs including brand identity, web design, print materials, digital marketing assets, UI/UX design, and packaging design.

items.question: How fast will I receive my designs?
items.answer: Most design requests are completed within 48-72 hours. More complex projects may take longer, but we'll always communicate timelines upfront and keep you updated throughout the process.

items.question: What if I don't like the design?
items.answer: We offer unlimited revisions until you're completely happy with the result. We'll work with your feedback to refine the design until it meets your expectations perfectly.

items.question: How do I submit design requests?
items.answer: Simply use our client portal to submit requests with detailed briefs, reference materials, and any specific requirements. You can also schedule calls with your account manager for more complex projects.

items.question: How does billing work?
items.answer: We bill monthly in advance. Your subscription automatically renews each month, and you'll receive an invoice via email. We accept all major credit cards and bank transfers.

items.question: Are there any setup fees?
items.answer: No setup fees! You only pay the monthly subscription rate. We believe in transparent, straightforward pricing with no hidden costs or surprise charges.

items.question: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan?
items.answer: Yes, you can change your plan at any time. Upgrades take effect immediately, while downgrades will apply at your next billing cycle. We'll prorate any differences accordingly.
